name: Bishop Anthonee PATTERSON, both individually and derivatively on behalf of the General Assembly of the Church of the Lord Jesus Christ of the Apostolic Faith, Petitioner v. name_abbreviation: Patterson v. Trustees of General Assembly

parties: Bishop Anthonee PATTERSON, both individually and derivatively on behalf of the General Assembly of the Church of the Lord Jesus Christ of the Apostolic Faith, Petitioner v. The TRUSTEES OF the GENERAL ASSEMBLY OF the CHURCH OF the LORD JESUS CHRIST OF the APOSTOLIC FAITH, INC. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of October, 2008, the Emergency Application for Extraordinary Relief is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
958 A.2d 1039
Bishop Anthonee PATTERSON, both individually and derivatively on behalf of the General Assembly of the Church of the Lord Jesus Christ of the Apostolic Faith, Petitioner v. Oct. 14, 2008.
